text: aur tumhaaree striyon mein se jo maasik dharm se niraash ho chukee hon, yadi tumhen sandeh ho to unakee iddat teen maas hai aur isee prakaar unakee bhee jo abhee rajasvala nahin huee. aur jo garbhavatee striyaan ho unakee iddat unake shishu-prasav tak hai. jo koee allaah ka dar rakhega usake maamale mein vah aasaanee paida kar dega
